Name: Illuminate Coffee Bar
Description: A local coffee shop that cares as much about coffee as they do the people who serve it.

Name: San Francisco Bakery and Cafe
Description: Vibrant cafe serving soup, salads and sandiches plus sweets. Family-owned bakery serving breakfast and lunch. Full coffee service, amazing quiche, the best staff.

Name: Eldorado Cafe
Description: Colorful cantina serving Mexican tortas, guisas, enchiladas, carnitas and creative craft cocktails. They know their way around a margarita. Get their cheesy-n-rice as your side. You're welcome.

Name: Vigilante Gastropub and Games
Description: Board games are the main draw at this quirky bar with street-style bites and local beers. Revamped menu plus specialty cocktails are just a couple ways Vigilante is always improving.
Address: 7010 Easy Wind Drive Suite 150 Austin, TX 78752

Name: Full English
Description: Full English breakfasts, high tea and other British fare served in a space with funky and vintage decor. Colorful locals. Beans on toast. English-style pancakes with lemon and sugar.
